alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MANATEE AND SOUTH CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Downtown Saint Petersburg to near Memphis. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palmetto, Ruskin, Ellenton, Parrish, Memphis, Greater Sun Center, Little Manatee River State Park, Wimauma, Sun City Center, and Gibsonton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee
